archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Orders
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Initiating orders for consumable goods, spare parts and for monitoring and reporting on progress of consumable goods orders. The actual order placed is managed through the appropriate party management processes.

properties.value: These processes are responsible for initiating orders for consumable goods, spare parts and for monitoring and reporting on progress of consumable goods orders. The actual order placed is managed through the appropriate party management processes.
